relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: class MyPromise { PENDING = 'pending' FULLFILLED = 'fullfilled' REJECTED = 'rejected' constructor(excutor) { this._state = this.PENDING this._result = undefined const resolve = (data) => { this._changeState(data, this.FULLFILLED) } const reject = (reason) => { this._changeState(reason, this.REJECTED) } //执行过程中出现错误则直接失败 try { excutor(resolve, reject) } catch (error) { reject(error) } } _changeState(result, state) { if (this._state !== this.PENDING) return this._result = result this._state =....
